Package de.lessvoid.nifty.examples.usecase

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UseCaseRunnerAdapter
    An interface to use the UseCaseRunner and the Nifty examples with different NiftyRenderDevices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LoggerShortFormat  
    UseCase_a01_FullScreenColorNode
    Fill the whole screen with red using a background color and a content node.
    UseCase_a02_QuarterRootNodeWithTwoHorizontalChildNodes
    A single root node that is only a quarter of the screen, placed in the upper right corner and contains two child nodes using a horizontal child layout.
    UseCase_a03_FixedSizedRootNode
    A single root node with a fixed size and a blue background color.
    UseCase_a04_RotatingRootNode
    A single root node of a fixed size with a background color that is constantly rotating.
    UseCase_a05_RotatingChildNode
    A root node with two child nodes.
    UseCase_a06_PaddingAndMargin
    Padding and Margin demonstration.
    UseCase_b01_Canvas
    Custom canvas painter example.
    UseCase_b02_CanvasLinearGradient
    custom canvas painter rendering gradients.
    UseCase_b03_CanvasText
    custom canvas painter rendering text
    UseCase_b04_CanvasImage
    custom canvas painter for rendering images
    UseCase_b05_CanvasCustomShader
    custom canvas painter using a custom fragment shader ... read that last sentence again!
    UseCase_b06_CanvasTransformScale
    Demonstrate the scale transform of the NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b07_CanvasTransformTranslate
    Demonstrate the translate transform of the NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b08_CanvasTransformRotate
    Demonstrate the rotate transform of the NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b09_CanvasTransformReset
    Demonstrate the reset transform of the NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b10_CanvasProgressSpinner
    An example how to use an animated NiftyCanvas for a custom progress spinner animation.
    UseCase_b11_CanvasLines
    An example how to draw lines into a NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b12_CanvasArc
    An example how to draw arcs into a NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b13_CanvasLineAndArc
    An example how to draw arcs and lines as part of one path into a NiftyCanvas.
    UseCase_b14_CanvasCurves
    An example how to draw bezier curves.
    UseCase_b15_CanvasComposite
    An example how to use the different composite operations.
    UseCase_b16_Canvas  
    UseCase_c01_LabelControlTextAlign
    Display a simple text.
    UseCase_c02_LabelControlMinSize
    Show case that a Label without any size constraints will be scaled to the minimum text size.
    UseCase_c03_LabelControlAllStyles
    Show case CSS styles for the label control.
    UseCase_c10_ButtonBasic
    Display some simple Button - with style ;)
    UseCase_d01_StyleTest
    Demonstrates style support in Nifty.
    UseCase_i01_PointerEvents
    Mouse hover over an element.
    UseCase_i01_PointerEventsScreenToLocal
    Mouse hover over an element with output of local coordinates.
    UseCase_i02_StateChange
    State changes.
    UseCase_l01_DockLayoutSimple
    This example demonstrates the capabilities of the dock layout in a very simple way.
    UseCase_l02_DockLayoutSnake
    This example demonstrates the capabilities of the dock layout.
    UseCase_l03_DockLayoutCenter
    This example demonstrates the capabilities of the dock layout with a centered central node.
    UseCase_l04_AlignmentLayoutCenter
    This is a simple example of the alignment layout node.
    UseCase_l05_AlignmentLayoutCorners
    This is a simple example of the alignment layout node.
    UseCase_l06_AlignmentLayoutStretching
    This is a simple example of the alignment layout node.
    UseCaseRunner
    A helper class that initializes the rendering subsystem and the main Nifty instance.
    UseCaseRunnerAdapterDummy
    UseCaseRunnerAdapter for dummy devices.
    UseCaseRunnerAdapterJava2D  
    UseCaseRunnerAdapterOpenGL
    UseCaseRunnerAdapter for CoreGL based NiftyRenderDevice.
